title: Learning Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Sociotransformative Learning Experience Design Using Narrative Distance

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners design educational content using narrative distancing techniques to improve learner engagement by 30% or more.
Learners can apply the six principles of transformative learning experiences to actual lesson design.

Learners develop one educational scenario reinterpreting social studies content (e.g., democracy, citizenship) using two or more narrative media (video, text, role-play) within a week and achieve an "Excellent" rating in at least two of the peer evaluation rubric’s three criteria: creativity, educational effectiveness, feasibility
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
